item.title: Else Is Evil

item.title: Nginx, Varnish and Wordpress with SSL Termination
Superfast WordPress
item.description: Introduction WordPress is clearly one of the world’s most used Content Management Systems (CMS) commanding over 35% of the internet, and over 60% of the CMS market [1]. Working in Operations (ops), you see your fair share of friends, family and businesses that ask you to set up a WordPress site as their go to blogging platform. This really comes down to WordPress’ ease of use, massive library of themes and it’s modular nature that enables the extension of it’s core via the use of plugins.

item.title: Just Ship It
item.description: A while back, I met up with a friend where we started conversing about side projects and how we find it so hard to find the time and motivation to get into them. Moreover, how do we find our way into starting something and keeping at it? Yet, this felt like a rather common dilemma, as you can always find another ’life hack’ or ‘yet another self-help’ book on the matter.
